selected_script.title: Swipe Right on Love
selected_script.hook: Dating is a jungle out there. Let us help you find your perfect match.

objects.name: Smartphone with Dating App
objects.visual_prompt: A glowing smartphone showing a colorful dating app interface with heart icons and match notifications, held by animal paws.

objects.name: Heart Emojis
objects.visual_prompt: Floating pink and red heart emojis and sparkles in various sizes.

environments.name: Cozy Coffee Shop
environments.visual_prompt: A warm, inviting coffee shop interior with soft lighting, wooden tables, and plants, rendered in a colorful Pixar-style 3D animation aesthetic.

environments.name: Romantic Park
environments.visual_prompt: A beautiful sunset park scene with cherry blossom trees, a wooden bench, and warm golden hour lighting, rendered in colorful Pixar-style 3D animation.

environments.name: Fancy Restaurant
environments.visual_prompt: An upscale restaurant with candlelit tables, white tablecloths, and elegant decor, rendered in colorful Pixar-style 3D animation.

scenes.visual: A nervous penguin in a tiny bow tie sits alone at a restaurant table, checking his watch repeatedly. Across from him is an empty chair. He looks at the door hopefully, then slumps down sadly as time passes.
scenes.audio: Soft melancholic piano. Text overlay: 'Tired of getting ghosted?'

scenes.visual: A fluffy golden retriever enthusiastically shows vacation photos on his phone to a bored cat on a coffee date. The cat yawns dramatically, checks her watch, and slowly sinks under the table to escape.
scenes.audio: Awkward silence punctuated by enthusiastic barking. Text overlay: 'Bad dates happen.'

scenes.visual: A peacock spreads his magnificent feathers in a park, trying to impress a small sparrow who looks completely unimpressed and flies away. The peacock's feathers droop in disappointment.
scenes.audio: Record scratch sound effect. Text overlay: 'Sometimes you try too hard.'

scenes.visual: Split screen montage: A lonely panda eating noodles alone, a fox swiping left repeatedly on dating profiles looking frustrated, a sloth moving so slowly his date has aged and left.
scenes.audio: Comedic sad trombone. Text overlay: 'We've all been there.'

scenes.visual: Close-up of furry paws downloading the 'WildMatch' app. The screen glows with warm light. A happy otter's face lights up as matches start appearing with a satisfying 'ding' sound.
scenes.audio: Upbeat music kicks in. Notification sounds. Text overlay: 'Introducing WildMatch'

scenes.visual: The same penguin from scene 1 now confidently swipes right on another penguin's profile. Hearts explode on screen. Cut to them both arriving at the restaurant at the same time, both wearing matching bow ties.
scenes.audio: Cheerful orchestral swell. Text overlay: 'Find someone who shows up.'

scenes.visual: Montage of happy animal couples: Two flamingos forming a heart shape with their necks, a hedgehog carefully hugging another hedgehog, two owls sharing earbuds watching something on a phone, a giraffe and slightly shorter giraffe nuzzling.
scenes.audio: Heartwarming indie love song. Text overlay: 'Real connections. Real love.'

scenes.visual: The WildMatch logo animates in with hearts surrounding it. All the happy animal couples from previous scenes gather in the park for a group photo, waving at camera. The lonely animals from the beginning are now paired up and happy.
scenes.audio: Music crescendos. Voiceover (warm, friendly): 'WildMatch. Where every animal finds their person.' Text overlay: 'Download free today.'
